problem_text_cn: 如图△ABC中,AB、BC垂直平分线相交于点O,∠BAC=70°,则∠BOC度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in △ABC, the perpendicular bisector of AB and BC intersect at point O, ∠BAC = N_0, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OA,∵AB、BC的垂直平分线相交于点O,∴OA=OB=OC,∴∠OBA=∠OAB,∠OCA=∠OAC,∴∠OBA+∠OCA=∠OAB+∠OAC=∠BAC=70°,∴∠OBC+∠OCB=180°-(∠OBA+∠OCA+∠BAC)=40°,∴∠BOC=180°-(∠OBC+OCB)=140°.故选:A.
